packagegui.name: localrepo
packagegui.title: LocalRepo Configuration Settings

field.description:
LocalRepo allows for an offline build of pfSense while still maintaining package installation and removel.

Disabling the default pfSense repositories stops calling out to update the installed packages and eliminates
the updating webinterface page that would normally be present until it timeouts.

Enabling the "Disable default reositories" and not enabling a local repo will result
in not having local package installs available while still stopping the callout for package updates.
Select this option to enable a local repository on the system.
Select this option to enable default repositories on the system.
Enter the directory location of the new repository. (ex: /usr/local/etc/pkg/repos)
Enter the name of the new repository. (ex: local_repo)
Enter the name of the new repository configuration file. (ex: local_repo)
Packages to include in the local repository.
